attributes.action: Ensure his Government stops the use of spin when releasing information of public relevance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We're intelligent, politically aware and able to decide for ourselves.  By attempting to manipulate the media message, the Government underestimates the ability of the public at large.  By doing so, it breeds the mistrust of the public, and goes a fair way towards undermining democracy in the UK.

Of course, we appreciate that this isn't an issue solely for the Government.  However, it would be nice for once if they lead by example for a change.
